title: A Shining Moon's Observatory
content:
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

[[include :scp-wiki:theme:space]]

> Greetings, fellow curious researchers.
>   
> Welcome to A Shining Moon's Observatory. Here lies drafted down **data** //(artworks)// of **Celestial Bodies** //(SCPs)//, **Astronomical Phenomena** //(tales)//, and many more to come. 

-----
+ Observation Logs

||~ ICON||~ CORRESPONDING DATA||~ MEANING||
||= ✦ ||= Celestial Body ||= SCPs Art||
||= ✧ ||= Astronomical Phenomena ||= Tales Art||

> Please select the **Telescopic data** you would like to inspect further by clicking on it.
>    
> If you want to get more information about the data, please navigate to the desirable **"Observation Report"** //(artwork page)//.
>   
> Data that yet to receive their individual **Observation Report** will be labeled as **"No Report Available"**.
>   
> The Data's arrangement is not time-linear nor based on any standards.

-----
+ The Moon's Live Telescopic Data
By studying the live data from the 24/7 observation telescope, the observer may learn about the nature of the Moon.

[[collapsible show="✶ Look at the Telescope? ✶" hide="You see words being scribbled, then erased, then rewritten on the surface of a shining Moon."]]
> Are you looking at me?
>    
> ...
>   
> Hello! I am, as you see, just **a shining moon**. However, another nickname I also prefer is "Yue".
> Moons have no gender, right? So any pronouns are fine with me.
>   
> As you can see, there are many types of data being noted down around here. You may find full-colored images, scribbled and sketched images, and sometimes a mixed-matched result. I love to experience various styles of illustrating, so please bear with me through this journey.
>   
> Feel free to explore the Observatory, and don't forget that any data being stored here falls under the [https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/ CC-BY-SA 3.0]! 
>     
> I do take requests. If you want me to check your work out and see if it works with my art, please check the //Discussion// to see how!
>   
> Oh, and if you want to establish another connection between us, here are some places designated for Moon-watching: 
> [https://bsky.app/profile/ashiningmoon.bsky.social Bluesky]
> [https://x.com/ashiningmoon Twitter]
> Discord - ashiningmoon
>     
> Finally, thank you for spending your time with me! 
[[/collapsible]]

 _
